thread.section_title: PlantShed New York Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlantShed New York Flowers | plantshed.com
thread.title: Mariela Peguero
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Mariela Peguero

author: Mariela Peguero
title: Mariela Peguero
text: I have never ordered flowers from PlantShed and after a google search for deliveries in Brooklyn came upon their site. Great selections, at reasonable prices, great staff, helpful. The receiver of my order was really happy and meantioned how great the flowers were. Overall positive experience.
